reviews.review_text:
Wonderful restaurant in South Goa, they haven‚Äôt advertised themselves much but found it by chance since we had booked a stay at club Mahindra close by.
The restaurant is very elegant in the evening with the lights and music.

All the food items we tried over 3 days turned out to be good, loved the chicken biryani it was totally different .

Service is excellent and the manager is a very nice person who even sang songs for our kids despite the closing hours , definitely coming back to enjoy the biriyani in a more leisure way.

The washrooms can be a little better maintained though.

Edit : We went there on second day too. This time four of us had a ball of time. It‚Äôs an amazing place with beautiful atmosphere. Go there you will definitely enjoy.
First timeüëáüèº
I was alone and wasn‚Äôt the best time to explore. My taxi driver said it‚Äôs good basis on he has seen lots of people there. That‚Äôs right. Ambience and music along with the location brings some charm. I ordered prawns and manchow soup . Both were good. Coconut Daiquiri was nice too. Very well presented food. One star less because their French fries tasted like cardboard. But over all a nice experience and a beautiful evening.

Leda balcao has to be on your list of restaurants to visit in South Goa. We enjoyed the Goan food and can't recommend this place enough.  We particularly enjoyed the prawns curry with rice, simple yet hearty . The staff are very kind and courteous. The Ambience is beautiful and the music makes the atmosphere, perfect.
